programme.desc: An Nollaig a bheidh faoi chaibidil ag Elmo inniu. (Elmo is learning all about Christmas today.)

programme.title: Elmo Anseo
programme.desc: Ag foghlaim faoi chearáité a bheidh Elmo inniu. (Elmo is learning all about karate today.)

programme.title: Pip & Posy
programme.desc: Ní hí an chomhairle chéanna atá ag Pip ná ag Posy do Jamila faoi bheith ag sleamhnú síos an cnoc. (Pip and Posy try to teach Jamila how to sledge down the hill.)

programme.title: Olobob Top
programme.desc: Tá na scamaill ar fad ina gcodladh. An mbeidh na hOlobobanna in ann iad a dhúiseacht le go dtosóidh sé ag sneachta? (The Olobobs discover all the snowclouds are sleeping.)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Féachann na Coileáin le seilbh a fháil ar Chnoc Mistéire dóibh féin. (The Wolfies want to takeover Mystery Mountain for themselves tonight.)

programme.title: Wussywat
programme.desc: Faigheann Wussywat rudaí nua a cara ar iasacht ach milleann sí iad. (Wussywat borrows her friends' new things but ends up ruining them.)

programme.title: Clifford
programme.desc: Caitheann Caitlín a lá breithe ag tógáil pictiúr dá cairde. (Elizabeth, Pablo and Jack plan a special surprise party for Samantha's birthday.)

programme.title: Woozle & Pip
programme.desc: Ligeann Woozle air féin gur eilifint é atá ina chónaí i líon damháin alla. (Woozle pretends to be an elephant who lives in a spider web.)

programme.title: Vegesaurs
programme.desc: Baineann Úllchuilleog ga as Ginger agus fágtar cneá uirthi. (Ginger gets stung by an Appleflyus and it leaves a painful and incredibly itchy sore.)

programme.title: Dot
programme.desc: Tá maisiúcháin an chrainn Nollag ar iarraidh. (The Christmas tree decorations are missing.)

programme.title: Ella Bella Bingo
programme.desc: Tá Lisa agus Lottie ag troid mar gheall ar dhath nua a seomra codlata. (Lisa and Lottie are fighting over the new colour of their room.)

programme.title: Cúla4
programme.desc: Níl aon easpa cláracha do dhaoine óga ar Cúla4 - bí ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in éineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with Cúla4 - watch, play and learn.)

programme.title: Charlie agus Lola
programme.desc: Tá teas damanta ann is tá Charlie agus Lola ag iarraidh iad féin a fhuarú. (It's extremely hot, and Charlie and Lola are trying to stay cool.)

programme.title: Petronix Defenders
programme.desc: Tá an Banphrionsa Petswiper ag iarraidh peata cóála. (Princess Petswiper wants a koala for a pet.)

programme.title: Pat an Madra
programme.desc: Tá Lola cinnte go bhfuil speiceas nua aimsithe aici, guano réamhstairiúil. (Lola thinks she has discovered a new species, a prehistoric guano.)

programme.title: Angelo Rules
programme.desc: Tá Angelo i bponc - tá dráma Pheadair agus gig Slobber ar siúl ag an am céanna. (Angelo has a problem - Peter's play is clashing with Slobber's gig.)

programme.title: Dónall Dána
programme.desc: Caithfidh Dónall bealach a fháil lena dhún a chosaint. (Henry has to find a way to protect his fort.)

programme.title: Cúla4
programme.desc: Níl aon easpa cláracha do dhaoine óga ar Cúla4 - bí ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in éineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with Cúla4 - watch, play and learn.)

programme.title: Super Simple Amhráin
programme.desc: Amhrán spraíúil faoi shiorcín óg a bheidh inniu againn. (A fun song about a Baby Shark.)

programme.title: Blocuimhreacha
programme.desc: Uimhreacha agus ealaíon a bheidh ag na Blocuimhreacha inniu. (The Numberblocks try and figure out some numbers by using art today.)

programme.title: Blocdhathanna
programme.desc: Bíonn an-spraoi ag na Blocdhathanna ag cur dath ar an mBogha Ceatha. (The Colourblocks have so much fun today as they try and colour the Rainbow.)

programme.title: Na Blociontais
programme.desc: Tá Gabh agus Stop ag iarraidh cró folaigh na Circa a aimsiú. (Go and Stop go on a mission to find Secret Agent Chicken's holiday hideout.)

programme.title: Pompon An Béirín Beag
programme.desc: Tá deifir faoi Pompon chun bualadh le Rita ar maidin, go bhfeicfidh siad an ghrian ag éirí. (Pompon is in a rush to meet Rita early in the morning, so they can see the sunrise.)

programme.title: Scéal an Lae
programme.desc: Is í Ciara Cox a bheidh ag léamh scéal an lae inniu. (Today's story of the day is read by Ciara Cox.)

programme.title: Pip & Posy
programme.desc: Buann Posy rás cé nár rith sí an cúrsa ar fad. (Posy wins a sledge race by missing part of the course and tries to keep her secret.)

programme.title: Scoil Bheag Helen
programme.desc: Molann Helen dá daltaí cluiche grianghrafadóireachta safari a imirt. (Helen suggests to her students that they play photo-safari.)

programme.title: Scoil Bheag Helen
programme.desc: Tugann Clóra arm seangán faoi deara le linn chleas na bacóide. (While everybody is playing hopscotch, Clóra spots an army of ants.)

programme.title: True agus Ríocht an Bhogha Ceatha
programme.desc: Is fadhb mhór do True agus dá cairde go bhfuil Criostal Oighir tagtha chuig Cathair an Bhogha Ceatha. (An Ice Crystal comes to visit and causes a huge problem.)

programme.title: Super Simple Amhráin

programme.title: Daisy & Ollie
